Comment: My portfolio lost almost 20% in value when the market dipped earlier in April. I DCA when the market was almost at the bottom and now my portfolio is almost back to it's original value, except I'm showing more gains now than before because I was able to pick up more shares on the cheap.  Anyone thinking these guys are worried about a month's worth of market movement needs to educate themselves on how the market works.
